body.name: Shop Again Over The Sink Dish Drying Rack, Dish Drying Rack Dish Drainer Stainless Steel for Organization Storage Space Saver Utensil Holder Cutting Board Holder Kitchen Counter Storage Rack,Black
features: 【Large Dish Drainer 】The bowl rack can hold up to 12 bowls, the dish rack can hold up to 13 dishes, the square basket can hold cups or fruit & vegetable, and all your forks, spoons, knife, chopping board and other cooking utensils can be tidily organized for easy access.

【Dimension】 This over the sink kitchen organization Inside dimension: 31.89 (L) x 10.8 (W) x 21.5 (H) inches; Outside dimension: 33.5(L) x 10.8 (W) x 21.5(H) inches. The height of the faucet should be ≤ 17.8 inch; The length of the sink should be ≤ 31.9 inch. The height between the cabinet and the countertop should be ≥ 21.5 inch (not include the height of the dish and bowl). Please measure the length of your sink, the height of the faucet and the the height of the cabinet before purchasing.
【Package Includes】 1 x Bowl Basket + 1 x Dish Basket + 1 x Fruit & Vegetable Basket + 1 x Detergent Basket + 1 x Forks and Spoon Cage + 1 x Knife Holder + 1 x Chopping Board Rack + 8 x Hooks.

【Easy Assemble & Sturdy Construction】This over the sink dish drying rack made of heavy-duty stainless steel, capable of holding tons of dishes and utensils. Rustproof and Anti-scratch Finish, no worry about getting rusted. With 4 suction cups at the foot bottom to improve the rack's position, make it not lean forward or shake, Stainless steel dish drying rack comes with instructions,Only less than 10 minutes to put all together.

【Why Choose Shop Again】: Enjoy a worry-free experience with our 100% LIFETIME warranty and 100% 30 days money-back guarantee. Please contact us with your questions or complaints, Shop Again excellence service will reply to you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This purchase was the best one during the Labor holiday. The function of this rack is not only over the sink dish rack, but also a cutlery holder, kitchen utensil holder, and a utility cleaning holder that can be used for cleaning supplies and brushes. Super sturdy and quick to put together, and Well packaged, no scratches or bend parts. At first, I was worry about the dimension of the product, sometimes it is incorrect with whatever adverting on the page. However, It freed up counter space and the black color matched perfectly to our kitchen. I was concern it wouldn’t be tall enough for the shape of our faucet and the cupboards above but it fit perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have!! Love this drainer
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to put together and cleared up so much counter space.... nice and sturdy and I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, looks nice
reviews.reviewText: This was fairly easy to assemble which is good because the directions are confusing in that the parts needed don't correspond to what is listed in the particular step. I had to fiddle with the connectors to get them to fit in the tubes. One of the legs was dinged when I took it out of the package.It looks nice in my kitchen. It is not adjustable (not sure why I thought it was). My sink is within the dimensions listed, but it doesn't fit on the sink frame nor straddle it. I had to secure a block under one leg for stability.That's a lot of complaints, but overall, I'm satisfied enough to not go through the hassle of returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small kitchens!
reviews.reviewText: It's perfect and I've had no problems! It took a lot longer to assemble then I thought but it holds a lot of dishes like pots and pans. I don't have to worry about water dripping on the sides.The photo is when I first assembled it but I wish I took a photo of all the dishes on it just to show how much room I save and it's holding power

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s perfect for us
reviews.reviewText: The instructions weren’t so great, but it wasn’t too hard to put together. The suction cups don’t work at all, but it’s sturdy enough to stand on its own. It’s perfect for our home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my mom and she just opened it to the surprise is missing the screws. So, how she supposed to ensembles? :/

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value on spacesaver drying rack
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to assemble by myself. Comes with allen head wrench. Product is exactly 💯 as described. Just be certain that you measure the distance for your sink facet. Mine just barely fit under the rack, but my facet has a hose/nozzle end so it wasn't a problem. A standard facet would have been an issue. Recommend this item for small kitchens with little countertop space. Great spacesaver!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More counter space !!!!
reviews.reviewText: I really am pleased with this rack! It is the perfect size for our sink and it doesn’t block the view out the window too much! It’s also is going to improve the area ! We are used to having a traditional rack and this frees up so much counter space it’s ridiculous !!

Mi esposa y yo quedamos sorprendidos por lo robusto y firme que es.No se mueve y nos ha aguantado poner la olla express(8 lts) a secar sin pandearse o inclinarse.El material se siente resistente, 7 meses de uso y no hay oxidación ni dobleces.
Buena forma de aprovechar el espacio, producto de buena calidad. Muy resistente.

reviews.reviewTitle: La rejilla de los platos necesita ser más profunda está muy corta
reviews.reviewText: Me gustaría que tuviera la rejilla de los platos más profunda, porque está muy flagil

Por ahora le doy 3 estrellas, vinieron dos piezas que no encajan, estan mal echas, por fortuna nos la ingeniamos para que pudiéramos armarlo. La resistencia no la veo buena, aún no la pruebo. Espero sea inoxidable como dicen, si no la verdad es tirar el dinero. Actualizaré más adelante
